quotes.quote: How many a dispute could have been deflated into a single paragraph if the disputants had dared to define their terms.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: The Argument from Intimidation is a confession of intellectual impotence.
quotes.author: Cathy Ladman

quotes.quote: My parents only had one argument in forty-five years. It lasted forty-three years.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: He who strikes the first blow admits he's lost the argument.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I can win an argument on any topic, against any opponent. People know this, and steer clear of me at parties. Often, as a sign of their great respect, they don't even invite me.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Use soft words and hard arguments.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The most perfidious way of harming a cause consists of defending it deliberately with faulty arguments.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The thing I hate about an argument is that it always interrupts a discussion.
quotes.author: Jascha Heifetz

quotes.quote: No matter what side of the argument you are on, you always find people on your side that you wish were on the other.
quotes.author: Joseph Farrell

quotes.quote: That's the beauty of argument-if you argue correctly, you're never wrong.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: If you go in for argument, take care of your temper. Your logic, if you have any, will take care of itself.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.quote: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.
quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

quotes.quote: Arguments are to be avoided; they are always vulgar and often convincing.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: It is not necessary to understand things in order to argue about them.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: In a heated argument we are apt to lose sight of the truth.
quotes.author: William G. McAdoo

quotes.quote: The argument is at an end.
quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

quotes.quote: I learned an important lesson in the art of debate. Present your argument clearly, arm yourself with cutting wit and of course, bob and weave!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: It is impossible to defeat an ignorant man in argument.
With reasonable men I will reason; with humane men I will plea; but to tyrants I will give no quarter, nor waste arguments where they will certainly be lost.
For they are yet ear-kissing arguments.
